articles.title: Central bank gold statistics - March 2024 | Post by Krishan Gopaul | Gold Focus blog - World Gold Council
articles.description: Central banks reported 16t of net buying in March via the IMF and other public data sources. Demand remained healthy: monthly gross purchases were steady m/m at 40t, partly offset by gross sales of 25t. Post by Krishan Gopaul
